Trigger.Name: 分摊 倒计时
Trigger.RegularExpression: \bgains the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Unholy Darkness|ディレイスペル：ダ`クホ`リ`) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for (?<duration>[0-9\.]+) Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 石化 关闭
Trigger.RegularExpression: \blose[s]? the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Shadoweye|ディレイスペル：シャドウアイ) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15}\.$

Trigger.Name: 火3
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 1A:[0-9a-fA-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z\-' ]{5,21}) gains the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Dark Fire III|ディレイスペル：ダ`クファイガ) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for 9999\.00 Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 分摊 关闭
Trigger.RegularExpression: \blose[s]? the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Unholy Darkness|ディレイスペル：ダ`クホ`リ`) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15}\.$

Trigger.Name: 石化 倒计时
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 1A:[0-9a-fA-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z\-' ]{5,21}) gains the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Shadoweye|ディレイスペル：シャドウアイ) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for (?<duration>[0-9\.]{4,5}) Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 大范围蓄力
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 14:3FC(?<ID>D|E):(Leviathan|リヴァイアサン) starts using Temporary Current on \1\.$

Trigger.Name: 海底地震
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 14:3F(?<ID>D0|CF):(Leviathan|リヴァイアサン) starts using Undersea Quake on \1\.$

Trigger.Name: 大海啸
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 1A:[0-9a-fA-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z\-' ]{5,21}) gains the effect of (?<effect>Surging|Smothering|Swirling|Splashing) Waters from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for 9999\.00 Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 炸弹:准备
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 14:40EC:(Titan|タイタン) starts using Bomb Boulders on \1\.$

Trigger.Name: 十字跳
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 14:40FA:(Titan|タイタン) starts using Massive Landslide on \1\.$

Trigger.Name: 左右坍塌
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 14:4(?<ID>0FF|100):(Titan|タイタン) starts using (Leftward|Rightward) Landslide on \2\.$
